title: Patreon Video
description:
Video introduction to the Deep Talks Theology Podcast Patreon page 


SUPPORT THIS CHANNEL AND PODCAST AT:
https://www.patreon.com/deeptalkstheologypodcast

transcript_parts.text: we people today are attempting to
educate themselves and find answers to
their deepest questions isn't the same
as it was 10 years ago and over the next
10 years it will only continue to evolve
instead of the traditional methods of
Education many are turning to new
avenues of Education and media like
podcasts and YouTube to explore answers
to their deepest questions today I'm a
full time pastor but for 11 years I
taught theology and biblical studies
courses in a traditional classroom
setting I feel the deep need to help
people who are turning to these
alternative methods of education and to
help them find the right resources so
I'm taking my knowledge and experience
out of the traditional classroom and
into these new avenues of Education in
2018 I created a podcast called deep
talks exploring theology and meaning
making this is a podcast that's
dedicated to exploring the
interconnected nature of theology - all
of the ways we search for meaning and
purpose in my view the goals for this
podcast currently available in both
audio only and video format and the
other digital content I'm working on in
our first the foster nuanced
non-combative dialogue about theology
and culture science the arts
entertainment and philosophy within a
broad historic Christian perspectives
and I want to do that in a way that
helps people answer their toughest
questions and equips them to lovingly
bless people in the diverse world they
inhabit secondly I want to provide free
theological and philosophical education
using some of the best resources and
research used in top seminaries and
divinity schools across the world and
just do it down to a high-schooler
undergrad level for students of life
that might not be pursuing advanced
degrees in these subjects with so many
people either disillusioned by
unsatisfying answers of our secular age
or going through a phase of
deconstruction and questioning in faith
they were raised in deep talks offers a
positive map to find true meaning life
and a positive path to help people
reconstruct their faith within a broad
historic Christian perspective I so
value your support and patronage 500
stink in the podcast recording and video
tools cost money not only that but for
each episode I put in a good amount of
time and to study research recording and
edit
to complete the finished product that
you hear or watch even with that I still
want to improve our video content and
bring on amazing guests in 2019 for
interviews those kinds of dreams require
an even greater commitment your
contributions can make that happen for
the thousands of listeners to begin and
engaging with these important topics
[Music]
